::DrillBit::

DrillBit's enternal repairs have finished there job, including filtering
Mosquitor's acid from his body.
-Computer- All enternal repairs finished. Toxic substance, vented.
Stasis lock no longer nesesary. Reactivation in five, four, three, two,
one...
DrillBit comes back online.
"Beast mode." He transformes to his beetle mode, drills under ground,
and followes Terrorsaur and KitKat.
He opens his comlink to Megatron.
"This is DrillBit. Terrorsaur, KitKat, and myself are retreatin. If you
don't like it, to bad. We're not getting scraped for you're suicidal
plans."
